name: socks
text: A comment left by socks was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by UntilYouAreSoNude, Zefiel, madnes, apocowarg, symbolsoup, littlecat, delzhand, hellofyellin, riotdejaneiro, cryztal, StoatLad, Vondicus, NeoNaoNeo, Mangtastic, DiamondMonster, hectik, falseprophet, StagnantDisplay, odei, GMM, equinn2006, Broahsaurus, wazza, NDCaesar, fancypants, hrbobhope, verplanck, obeymydog, michellemarie, prettyrad, GrooveHolmes, mira, Fielding, sdskyle, luckypyjamas, lk, ketamind, Crater12, RBisme, foetus_punch, wartooth, nutmeg, brotherbrian, TheGreatestCape, Slab64, scraggg, lastlarf, Panserbjorne, Mastronaut, Milo, ouroboros, Pigs, aperson)

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
I don't know where you get that from, but hell, you're entitled to your opinion.

Anyone who's been really inebriated with a good friend will get this, however.

name: wite_rabit
text: Just this past weekend in fact.

name: excusemesenator
text: I've never been inebriated with anyone and I still get this.

name: hyetal
text: Normally I don't care about others' opinions, and this is no exception.  Many are those who've been lamed out of existence for confessing their lack of a preference for a given comic.  But now I'm curious.  Why are you fully "pissed off" by this comic?  And why did you create two posts, thus doubling your incoming lames?

name: hipjiverobot
text: While I find nothing wrong with this particular strip, I think this comment's lame count is a good example about how no achewood commenter is ever allowed to say anything bad about even one strip. Don't seem right.

name: deusoma
text:
While I appreciate the sentiment...
Dude, it's Socks. Everyone hates Socks.

name: hipjiverobot
text: True. Upon closer examination he has made 112 comments and has been marked for spam 94 times. That is not a good ratio.

name: 7th_shot
text: untilyouaresonude is right, but as someone who's been there, I rate this one is a solid 5. Hip-Hobbit? Beatbox my dwarfcore? These are the sort of marijuana concepts my friends and I have come up with on lazy Sundays.

name: slab64
text: That's probably because you actually listen to black elf-rock.

name: akarroa
text: System of a Drow?

name: ketelcat
text: Oohhh my goodness. Chubby for unashamed geekyness combined with good punning skills

name: kaithekender
text:
You ever been eating rice and then something makes you laugh so hard the rice somehow gets from your mouth back onto your plate FROM YOUR NOSTRILS

I didn't even know it was a thing until just now.

Chubbied

name: kledermans
text: This pisses you off?  Do you also go ballistic when old men sneeze in a restaurant, or crap your pants when you pass a used car dealership?

name: saint
text: do you scream "FUCK YOU" at toddlers when they cry because they dropped their sucker in the dirt?

name: soticoto
text: I just give them the condescending stare of shame.

name: d-pad
text: This suffices for most toddlers. The "FUCK YOU" is normally reserved for special occasions.

name: farqussus
text: This man is but a crank, he winds you up.

name: gitarooman
text: You obviously do not know what it is to be stoned

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I really disagree. Hip-hobbit is pretty brilliant, in my book. I think Ray could totally market that idea. It doesn't pack much of a comedic punch on its own, but it works in the context of the arc. Plus, Ray's beatbox is t- izz -ight!

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, Spoon, sarmatron, pwb, Mangtastic, 7th_shot, hectik, fosters, StagnantDisplay, TheGreatestCape, Doc_Rostov)

name: pwb
text: heck of lame

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Rhadamanthus, sarmatron, Mangtastic, mugi, TheGreatestCape, Doc_Rostov)

name: money4something
text: But... but HOW can you dislike hip-hop? Its so good!

name: soticoto
text:
It is unmusical. It is uncomplicated. And its very nature is to crudely objectivise people.
I find it unaesthetic and it disrupts my mood.

name: anzio
text: I want to know what music you enjoy.

name: dartigen
text: Well...there is pirate hip-hop (Captain Dan and the Scurvy Crew), pirate metal (Alestorm, among others) and wizard rock (various Harry-Potter themed bands) and even this one metal band that does everything in Klingon. Why not Hip-hobbit? (I am more for hobbit rock though. It would be like the more mellow of Led Zeppelin's stuff.)

name: slab64
text: I don't think Tolkien was every crazy enough to write about something as ridiculous as a boiling log. I mean, even when he was all senile and stuff.

name: kaithekender
text:
Actually a little-known fact is that he wrote the entirety of The Lord of the Rings after going senile.

However, it was intended to be his memoirs.

name: senseihollywood
text: this is probably the first time the phrase "beat box my dwarf-core, dude!" has been uttered...at least I hope it is

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mygoodfriend, fosters, goocifer, isunklower, pa_ass_nts, cheeks_jd)

name: tttt2
text: A comment left by tttt2 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, equinn2006, Tagrineth, Aaron_Haynes, Firehawk, foetus_punch, Mastronaut)

name: stuart
text: Uhh... you mean Chris?

name: rowboat
text: Unfortunately, I think "she" means Jeff.

name: ford
text: I suppose it could be a shittily-done Eddie Izzard reference (think Death Star canteen)

name: johnnyrocker
text: Jeff Onstad is an amazing writer.

name: epicurus
text: yyyyy... I wanna say... yes?

name: audhumla
text: I completely hear 3 Inches Of Blood when I imagine these lyrics being sung for real

name: theguitarhero
text:
My cousin is in 3 Inches Of Blood.

I think he's the drummer.

name: vreeeee
text: Ray just taught me how to beat box!

name: nicolae
text:
AS GOBLIN SOULS
GAVE BIRTH TO WAR
AND ALL THAT IT INFECTS

name: nicolae
text:
THE MOSSY OGRE WARLORD
WAS ROUSED BY THE CLARION CALL
HE STUMBLED FROM THE ICY CAVES
WITH A MAGIC BLOOD-STAINED MAUL

name: nicolae
text:
THE WANTON WAILING BANSHEE
WAS VERILY TORN TO SHREDS
THE WIZARD RAGED AND THUNDERED
ON A TOWER OF SEVERED HEADS

name: nicolae
text: I could just do this all day, college be damned!

name: crinklebat
text: I just feel sad because the Lords of the Rhymes totally invented hip-hobbit a long time ago and I feel like they would have had more success if they had thought of calling it that.

name: woodenteeth
text: p a n e l  5! "Look at that man!"

name: tekende
text:
I looked at him

I looked at that man

name: i_love_kate
text:
The sap inside the log could be boiling. That's actually the danger of being near to a tree that's struck by lightning, as the sap hits boiling point so quickly that it explodes.

I bet the wizard plans that outcome.

name: tim_simmons
text: NOTORIOUS E.L.F

name: tim_simmons
text: WU TANG WIZARD

name: jlynes
text: THE SHIRE HILL GANG

name: tim_simmons
text: ORCS WIT ATTITUDE

name: jlynes
text: M. C. HELM'S DEEP

name: relaxing
text:
The Ol' Dirty Baggins

The Orcface Killah

Merry B. & Rakim

Minediggaz

Notorious B.R.A.N.D.Y.B.U.C.K.

De la Smeagol?

name: jlynes
text: FIDDY SILVER PIECES

name: hyetal
text: Please, do continue.

name: aghbar
text: As I already used up my chubbies for the page, I would just like to say hooray for the three of you.

name: deusoma
text: Yeah man, hooray for some guys.

name: doomchild
text:
Ozzgiliat.

That is all.

DC

name: mangtastic
text: MASSIVE chubbies for all of you.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Ballin'-rog?

name: professorhazard
text: I am always exclaiming "BEAT BOX MY DWARF-CORE!" at my wife, but she never launches into the ol' uh-pfuh uh-pssssh.

name: rowboat
text: Get a new wife.

name: professorhazard
text: I don't take orders from little bichon-frise-ghost-looking-things on the Internet. Only in real life.

name: rowboat
text:
Quote:
little bichon-frise-ghost-looking-things

Sir, that is absolutely the best incorrect description of my avatar that I've ever read. And there have been a few to choose from. Thank you.

How's the new wife workin' out for ya?

name: professorhazard
text: I decided to take your advice and get a new one after all. However, I kept the old one. Yay, polygamy!

name: rowboat
text: That's the spirit.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Actually, the Lords of the Rhymes invented this long before T and Ray did, I think.

name: hellofyellin
text: The fifth panel. Oh god the fifth panel.

name: highpitch_83
text: raymond smuckles: "beatbox extrodinare"

name: otterpops
text:
You have never seen a log boiling with ants, or boiling with centipedes.

Get out in the woods sometime, city boy.

name: jlynes
text:
Neither ants, nor centipedes, but I did once witness, from a very close range, a fallen log boiling with hornets.

And I ran. I ran so far away.

Well, really only as far as the first aid shack, but my point stands.

name: duperando
text: BEAUTIFUL.

name: curranesque
text: the possibility of a boiling log is debatable. you can usually see steam coming from a fresh log thrown onto a fire before it catches flame, which means the water inside has reached the boiling point. whether or not one could actually call this a boiling log i cannot speak to, though.

name: ariamaki
text:
Man, I hate to counter the alt-text... But absolutely anything can be boiling. ANYTHING.

Might not be easy, but it is possible-- And frightening to watch, in the case of solids.

name: terribleman
text: Does ray have massive bags under his eyes or are his eyes so small that they sunk beneath the glasses? I like the latter.
